title: Trading and crusading in the Middle Ages
itunes:title: Trading and crusading in the Middle Ages
itunes:subtitle: Mike Carr reveals how there was more to Muslim-Christian relations in the medieval era than the Crusades
description:
Mike Carr speaks to David Musgrove about Muslim-Christian relations in the medieval era, revealing how Papal-sanctioned trade was going on despite the background of the Crusades.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
